Writer: John Long (premise), Michael France (screen story), Michael France (screenplay), Sylvester Stallone (screenplay)
Title: Cliffhanger
Actors: Sylvester Stallone, John Lithgow, Michael Rooker, Janine Turner
Plot: A botched mid-air heist results in suitcases full of cash being searched for by various groups throughout the Rocky Mountains.
Awards: Nominated for 3 Oscars. Another 1 win & 9 nominations.
